arcade.core.util

Class Graph.Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.core.util.Graph.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Graph.Node>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchComponentSitesGraph.SiteNode
    Enclosing class:
    Graph

    public abstract static class Graph.Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Graph.Node>
    Nested class representing a graph node.

    The node tracks its corresponding position in the lattice.
